About Us
Welcome to Big Tunas Beach Bar & Grill
Big Tunas Beach Bar & Grill proudly serves delicious food to the greater Daytona Beach community.
Reviews
Nanett F.
New restaurant ---- clean and casual. Food was good. My daughter had the all you eat shrimp and I had the big fish sandwich.  Both were seasoned and cooked...
william kinsella
We would like to thank the fantastic staff at Big Tunaâs for excellent service, great food and most of all for their honesty! My wife left her wallet and The Manager went out of her way to drive to our home to deliver the wallet! Thank you so much it is very much appreciated! We...
See More
Abs and T Smith
A new restaurant in an older building that used to be a Ruby Tuesdays. Good food and occasionally live music. A bit pricey for the atmosphere that you would expect in a classier place, but we want to let it develop more as a business before we commit to a return visit or not....
See More
UwishUwereMe82
I wasn't a fan of my rum drink so Kelsey recommended an amazing Bourbon-tini! It was amazing. She was a great waitress & super friendly. Can't wait to go back and try some food. The drink is half full depending on how you look at it!
Karen
Have been there three times since our visit to Daytona. Super friendly staff and great food and drinks.
Brian Woy Sr
We ate here twice during our two week stay in Daytona Beach. The food was excellent! The wait staff were friendly and helpful. The Mac Daddy Lobsta was delicious! We will definitely be eating at Big Tuna's anytime we're in the area. GREAT JOB!
Submit Review
